name: Techno Joy
tagline: Creating digital solutions is our passion.
description:
Techno Joy is a Napier-based website development company, specialising in customised website solutions using the SilverStripe PHP framework.
It was founded in 2004 as an IT support company and expansion followed quickly by creating a website division. In 2007 we dropped the IT support and turned our focus entirely to being excellent web developers.
